title: Note-The additional fire safety requirements shall be as per fire manual approved by Municipal Commissioner based on the Fire Act and Fire Protection Chapter of NBC amended time to time
clause_text: Note-The additional fire safety requirements shall be as per fire manual approved by Municipal Commissioner based on the Fire Act and Fire Protection Chapter of NBC amended time to time.
section: Provided, if the building abuts two roads of 9 m or more, then clear open space of 9 m at ground level on one side deemed to be sufficient.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Note-The additional fire safety requirements shall be as per fire manual approved by Municipal Commissioner based on the Fire Act and Fire Protection Chapter of NBC amended time to time.
